judges: Before Maxey, C, J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Gangloee; costs to be paid by the appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: James J. Gallagher, with him John B. McGurl, for appellant.
John H. Fertig, with him Ralph M. Bashore, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Zerbey Estate.
Argued January 8, 1947.
Before Maxey, C, J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
James J. Gallagher, with him John B. McGurl, for appellant.
John H. Fertig, with him Ralph M. Bashore, for appellees.
January 28, 1947:
